Title: Object: Le Philosophe ancien
Description: St Anthony the Great, sitting with large book in his hands Engraving
Curator's comments: A 18th c. edition of a plate engraved between 1610 and 1662 (see 1952,0405.205) and originally representing St Anthony, after a composition by Claude Vignon; in this late edition, the plate was given a new title ('The old philosopher') and the composition was wrongly attributed to José de Ribera.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (26) (undescribed state)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
